AI Description: bcl2fastq is a software tool developed by Illumina that converts base call files (BCL) generated by Illumina sequencers into FASTQ files, which are commonly used for downstream sequence data analysis.
Core Features: Some core features of bcl2fastq include demultiplexing of sequencing data, barcode processing, quality score calculation, adapter trimming, and outputting high-quality FASTQ files ready for further analysis.
General Tags: Sequencing Data, Fastq Files, Illumina Sequencers
